items.sentence: Tom found out that Mary was planning a surprise birthday party for him.
I feel like a kid who suddenly realizes that Santa Claus doesn't exist.
We need to be more careful in the future, so this doesn't happen again.
Tom bad-mouthed Mary to all his friends and family after their breakup.
We don't know why but, at the last minute, Mary called off the wedding.
Tom and Mary each drank three cups of coffee before they left for work.
Tom wants to turn on the air conditioner, but Mary doesn't want him to.
Tom wants to turn the air conditioner on, but Mary doesn't want him to.
Tom has written several short stories, but hasn't yet published a book.
I should've known that Tom would do something we didn't want him to do.
Tom didn't know that he didn't have enough money to buy what he wanted.
Can you honestly tell me that you didn't know this was going to happen?
Did you know that there used to be a Chinese restaurant on Park Street?
Men are idiots when it comes to women and I'm sure Tom is no exception.
Tom spent the whole evening, staring at the girl at the end of the bar.
Tom and I plan to get married as soon as we both graduate from college.
I hope that you don't mind my mentioning this, but you know I love you.
After lunch, we all boarded the bus and headed to our next destination.
Are you certain that you lost your book, or did you merely misplace it?
If our last batter had not hit a home run, team would've lost the game.
